name: rep_at_pending_wrap
description: REP (CSI b) with pending wrap triggers wrap then repeats the character on the next line
comment: Print AAAAA (fills row 0, pending_wrap=true at col 4). REP 2 (CSI 2 b): repeats 'A' twice. First rep wraps to (1,0), second goes to (1,1). Row 0=AAAAA, row 1 starts with AA.
